description:
What is the course about?
-About this course is Basic 3D Piping by Autocad Plant 3D (Thai language)

Who should to be leaned the course?
-Piping designer, Piping Engineer, Draftsman.

What kind of materials are included?
-Project Exercise.

How long will the course take to complete?
-You can complete this course in 18 Hr.

How is the course structured?
-Create Project and handling file in project.
-Create steel structure.
-Create Parametric Equipment.
-Piping routing.
-Piping Editing and Advance topics.
-Design with P&ID Data.
-Creating and Annotating Orthographic views.
-Create isometric drawing.
-Spec and catalog editor.
-Advance topics.

Why take this course?
Because this course will help you easy and quick to lean Autocad Plant 3D.
title: Autocad plant 3D Courseware for beginner
